amendment.description: Amendment prohibits use of funds to require disclosure of race or ethnicity when purchasing firearms in the United States.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to require, pursuant to section 478.124 of title 27, or section 25.7 of title 28, Code of Federal Regulations, or the Office of Management and Budget Statistical Policy Directive No. 15, Race and Ethnic Standards for Federal Statistics and Administrative Reporting, that any person disclose the race or ethnicity of the person in connection with the transfer of a firearm to the person.
